description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Meds: Recommended Dosage 100mg 3 times daily. Classic retro-style gameplay with the only enemy being your mind. 50 levels of madness, each with randomly generated withdrawal symptoms.  Caution: you may never have the same experience twice. Taking pills may help, but beware of unexpected side effects. Taking meds with a friend may result in versus mode, so be sure to divide up your dosage evenly.
